'''Callum Wharry''' is a child actor from Northern Ireland who plays Prince [[Tommen Baratheon]]. ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]'' is his first acting experience. He initially appeared as a guest star in the [[Season 1|first season]] and returned in this role for the [[Season 2|second season]]. He did not appear in the [[Season 3|third season]]. For [[season 4]], [[Dean-Charles Chapman]], who had previously played Tommen's cousin [[Martyn Lannister]], took over the role of Tommen.
